channel.title: Help to skip freezing section...
channel.description: I am playing through the game fine till I run into the tank section where it freezes. Is there any way to just...skip this? I've had no issues and feel like this area is just buggy on my machine.

item.title: Help to skip freezing section...
item.dc:creator: thebolt
item.description:
Lost one:

Do you mean like in apprehension where your suit power is dropping or does your computer itself freeze at a certain section? please be specific.

I mean a tank the VEHICLE and I mean my machine the computer freezes.

Read full topic

item.title: Help to skip freezing section...
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
thebolt:

I am playing through the game fine till I run into the tank section where it freezes. Is there any way to just…skip this? I’ve had no issues and feel like this area is just buggy on my machine.

The freezing room in Office Complex? Sorry no way to skip that. But it’s not hard. Just kill off the enemies, locate the wheel and put it into it’s position, use it to move the trailer, than go back where the scientist is, and climb up to the vent…

Read full topic
